title: ConvertScalarImageToRGB
description: Converts a scalar image to an RGB image using specified parameters. Supports multiple colormap options and customization.

image_dimension.title: Image Dimension
image_dimension.description: The dimensionality of the image (e.g., 2D or 3D).

input_image.title: Input Image
input_image.description: The input scalar image to be converted to RGB.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: The mask image to apply during conversion.

colormap.title: Colormap
colormap.description: The colormap to use for RGB conversion.

custom_colormap_file.title: Custom Colormap File
custom_colormap_file.description: The file specifying the custom colormap (only used if colormap is 'custom').

minimum_input.title: Minimum Input
minimum_input.description: The minimum input value for scaling.

maximum_input.title: Maximum Input
maximum_input.description: The maximum input value for scaling.

minimum_rgb_output.title: Minimum RGB Output
minimum_rgb_output.description: The minimum output value for the RGB image. Defaults to 0.

maximum_rgb_output.title: Maximum RGB Output
maximum_rgb_output.description: The maximum output value for the RGB image. Defaults to 255.

vtk_lookup_table.title: VTK Lookup Table
vtk_lookup_table.description: The VTK lookup table to apply for additional customization.
